title: Convert Valentine proposal experience into a multi-page flow and update Reasons card copy

requirements.text: Convert the current single-page, scrollable Valentine experience into a multi-page website flow with four pages: (1) Hero, (2) Reasons I Love You, (3) Proposal, and (4) Final Love Note, while keeping the existing romantic theme, floating hearts, smooth animations, and background music behavior.

quotes: Create a romantic, interactive multiple-page website for a Virtual Valentine’s Day Proposal from Abubakar to his girlfriend Ayesha.

acceptanceCriteria: The app presents four distinct pages/screens: Hero, Reasons I Love You, Proposal, and Final Love Note (not a single long page of sections).
The “Start” button on the Hero page navigates the user to the Reasons page.
The user can progress from Reasons to Proposal and from Proposal to Final Love Note via clear UI navigation (buttons/links), without requiring manual scrolling to reach the next experience.
Background music remains available across pages and continues to follow gesture-safe playback requirements (no forced autoplay on iPad Chrome).
No photo or gallery sections are added anywhere in the multi-page experience.

requirements.text: In the “Reasons I Love You” page, render exactly 8 animated interactive cards (flip and/or glow behavior) and pre-fill each card with the exact messages provided by Abubakar (verbatim, including punctuation and ellipses).

quotes: In the “Reasons I Love You” section, create 8 animated cards. Each card must already contain the following romantic messages from Abubakar to Ayesha:
“I love you because your smile fixes my worst days without even trying.”
“I love you because you understand me in ways no one else ever could.”
“I love you because talking to you never feels enough — I always want more time.”
“I love you because your presence brings peace to my chaos.”
“I love you because you are cute, caring, and thori si nakhre wali in the most adorable way.”
“I love you because you motivate me to become a better man every single day.”
“I love you because life feels lighter, happier, and more meaningful with you in it.”
“I love you because out of everyone in this world… you chose me.”

acceptanceCriteria: The Reasons page contains exactly 8 cards (no more, no fewer).
Each card displays one of the provided messages exactly as written (verbatim).
Cards have interactive animation: flip or glow on hover where available, and remain usable on touch devices (tap to reveal/flip works).

requirements.text: Add soft heart-themed micro-animations to the “Reasons I Love You” cards so that hovering or flipping/tapping a card triggers a subtle romantic heart effect, while keeping performance smooth on iPad Chrome.

quotes: Cards should flip or glow on hover with soft heart animations.

acceptanceCriteria: Interacting with a Reasons card (hover on desktop and tap/flip on touch devices) triggers a subtle heart animation effect associated with that card.
Animations do not block scrolling or tapping, and do not noticeably degrade performance on iPad Chrome.

constraints: Do not add any photo or gallery sections anywhere in the app.
Keep the existing romantic design direction: soft red/pink tones, floating hearts, smooth animations, romantic cursive/handwritten fonts, and gentle background instrumental music.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths; compose them instead.
Backend remains a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
nonGoals: Adding or changing backend functionality (the backend actor can remain empty).
Adding third-party authentication beyond existing Internet Identity scaffolding.
Adding any user-uploaded images, photo galleries, or personal photo sections.
